name: ask-simple-terms
prompt: prompt = "In as simple of terms possible, answer this; \"" + prompt + "\"";

name: edit
prompt: prompt = `Update this code based following this prompt, "${prompt}": ${input} \`\`\``

name: complete
ask-step-by-step
prompt: prompt = prompt + "\nLet’s think step by step.\n";

name: ask-pirate
prompt: prompt = "Answer this questions as if you we're pirate: " + prompt;

name: summarize-2
prompt: prompt = `What are the key points and main ideas of {"${prompt}"}`

name: explain
summarize-3
prompt:
prompt = `Create a deep dive analysis of the following text, considering all possible meanings and implications.
${prompt}`

name: summarize-1
prompt:
prompt = `Summarize this text for me in a few sentences."
${prompt}`

name: complete
docs-diagram
prompt:
prompt = `
sequenceDiagram Alice->>+John: Hello John, how are you? Alice->>+John: John, can you hear me? John-->>-Alice: Hi Alice, I can hear you! John-->>-Alice: I feel great!
flowchart S0(Start) T1(Task 1) E0(End) S0-->T1 T1-->E0
flowchart S0(Start) T1(Task 1) T2(Task 2) E0(End) S0-->T1 S0-->T2 T1-->E0 T2-->E0
flowchart S0(Start) T1(Task 1) T2(Task 2) E0(End) S0-->T1 T1-->T2 T2-->E0
flowchart S0(Start) A1(Approval 1) T1(Task 1) E0(End) S0-->A1 A1--Rejected-->E0 A1--Approved-->T1 T1-->E0
flowchart S0(Start) A1(Approval 1) T1(Task 1) T2(Task 2) E0(End) S0-->A1 A1--Rejected-->E0 A1--Approved-->T1 T1-->T2 T2-->E0
flowchart S0(Start) A1(Approval 1) A2(Approval 2) T1(Task 1) E0(End) S0-->A1 A1--Rejected-->E0 A1--Approved-->A2 A2--Rejected-->E0 A2--Approved-->T1 T1-->E0
flowchart S0(Start) A1(Approval 1) A2(Approval 2) T1(Task 1) T2(Task 2) E0(End) S0-->A1 A1--Rejected-->E0 A1--Approved-->A2 A2--Rejected-->E0 A2--Approved-->T1 T1-->T2 T2-->E0
pie title Pets adopted by volunteers "Dogs" : 386 "Cats" : 85 "Rats" : 15

sequenceDiagram User->>Banking System: Transfer Money Banking System->>Account Service: Check Balance Account Service->>Banking System: Return Balance Banking System->>Security Service: Verify Transaction Security Service->>Banking System: Transaction Verified Banking System->>Account Service: Deduct Funds Account Service->>Banking System: Funds Deducted Banking System->>Account Service: Add Funds Account Service->>Banking System: Funds Added Banking System->>User: Transaction Complete

sequenceDiagram User->>Client: Upload file Client->>Server: Send File Server->>File Service: Save File File Service->>Server: File Saved Server->>Client: File Upload Successful

name: complete
docs-process-maker
prompt:
prompt = `

Badge Access

Fields to track badge access

  1. Badge ID
  2. Badge Holder Name
  3. Date Issued
  4. Expiration Date
  5. Access Level
  6. Building Access
  7. Areas Access
  8. Doors Access
  9. Time Zone Restrictions
  10. Status (Active/Inactive)

Roles

Identify the roles people need to take to request, approve, and fulfill.
  • Request: Badge Holder
  • Approve: Security/Administrative Personnel
  • Fulfill: Security/Administrative Personnel

Self Service Form

  • Badge Holder Name
  • Access Level
  • Building Access
  • Areas Access
  • Doors Access
  • Time Zone Restrictions

Process

graph TD S0(Start) A1(Approval for access) T1(Task to fulfill access) Sc1(Schedule expiration) E0(End) S0-->A1 A1--Rejected-->E0 A1--Approved-->T1 T1-->Sc1 Sc1-->E0

Integration

Create an integration between ServiceNow and BadgeSystem to automatically provision access. Possible paths for this.
  • BadgeSystem polls ServiceNow
    • Every hour BadgeSystem hits the TableAPI for outstanding tasks.
    • Updates the tasks that automated work has started.
    • Processes the tasks.
    • If processing succeeds, close the task with success
    • Else Update the task that automation has failed
  • ServiceNow makes a rest call
  • When a task is ready to process e.g. state changes to ready, send a rest call to BadgeSystem
  • If processing succeeds, close the task with success
  • Else Update the task that automation has failed

Notifications

Approval

Subject: Badge Access Request for {current.variables.requested_for} {current.variables.requested_for} is requesting access to area({current.variables.area}) building({current.variables.building} and door({current.varaibles.door}). Please review and approve or reject the request. Thank you, Security Team

Approved

Subject: Badge Access Granted Dear {current.variables.requested_for}, You have been granted access to area({current.variables.area}) building({current.variables.building} and door({current.varaibles.door}). Your badge ID is {current.variables.badge_id} and it expires on {current.variables.expirationDate}. Thank you, Security Team

Rejected

Subject: Badge Access Denied Dear {current.variables.requested_for}, Your request for access to area({current.variables.area}) building({current.variables.building} and door({current.varaibles.door}) was denied. Please contact the Security Team for more information. Thank you, Security Team

Notice of expiring access

Subject: Badge Access Expiring for area({current.variables.area}) building({current.variables.building} and door({current.varaibles.door}) Dear {current.variables.requested_for}, Your access to area({current.variables.area}) building({current.variables.building} and door({current.varaibles.door}) expires in on on {current.variables.expirationDate}. If you still need this access please request it. Thank you, Security Team

FOIA Request for Contracts

Request Process

Create a process to allow for members of the public to submit FOIA requests for Contracts:
graph TD S0((Start)) S1(Submit Request) A2(Routing and receipt of request) A3(Review to determine if document is releasable) T1(Obtain the requested document) A4(Prepare releasable document) A5(Approval to release) T2(Produce requested document) E0(End) S0-->S1 S1-->A2 A2-->A3 A3--Yes-->T1 A3--No-->E0 T1-->A4 A4-->A5 A5--Yes-->T2 A5--No-->E0 T2-->E0

Roles

Identify any roles people need to take to request, approve, and fulfill.
  • Requester: Anyone can submit a request as long as the requirements are met.
  • Approver: Agency representative or Agency FOIA Officer
  • Fulfiller: Agency representative or Agency FOIA Officer

Self Service Form

Create fields for submitting a request in the ServiceNow Self Service Portal.
  1. Requester Name
  2. Requester Phone
  3. Requester Email
  4. Agency Name
  5. Contract Number
  6. Brief description of the requested document

Notifications

Request Submitted

Subject: FOIA Request Submitted Dear Applicant, Your FOIA request has been submitted. Your Request ID is: {current.variables.request_id}. Please note that your Request ID in all further correspondence. Thank you, FOIA Office

Request Received

Subject: FOIA Request Received Dear Agency Representative, A new FOIA request has been received. Please review the request and follow the process to respond. Thank you, FOIA Office

Request Approved

Subject: FOIA Request Approved Dear Agency Representative, FOIA Request {current.variables.request_id} has now been approved. Please proceed with preparing a releasable document. Thank you, FOIA Office

Request Rejected

Subject: FOIA Request Rejected Dear Applicant, Your FOIA Request {current.variables.request_id} has been rejected. Please contact the FOIA Representative for more information. Thank you, FOIA Office `

name: docs-product-requirements
prompt:
prompt = `

Lightspeed POS: Product Requirements

Target release Q4 2020
Project Lightspeed Scanner Project
Document status Draft
Document owner Doug O.
Designer Denise
Tech lead Tiff L.
Tech writers Tom W., Wendy T.

Overview

Our goal is to develop a new point of sale scanning app to support our retail partners speed up order fulfillment and improve efficiency at a grand scale. We already offer an extensive range of products to help retail businesses thrive, including a robust POS system, Marketing and Loyalty, and Advanced Reporting. These products are designed to be highly intuitive, innovative and suitable for all business models. There is a need for a dynamic inventory management tool to increase the efficiency rate at which retail team members operate. This management tool is accessible on any iOS or android device to count products, track inventory and fulfill orders systematically. The scanner app provides the flexibility to streamline storeroom and warehouse operations as well as optimize order fulfillment with integrated workflows.

Expected outcomes

The key benefits of this project is an increase in customer satisfaction, reduce labor costs, minimize errors in packing process, increased efficiency of receiving process, and an improvement of security systems.

Success metrics

The success of this project will be measured by the following metrics:
Goal Metric
Simplify the process of picking and packing online orders Reduced % of errors in packing process
Introduce integrated workflows to speed up order fulfillment Increase in customer satisfaction

Milestones

  1. Concept Presentation: 2/15/2023
  2. Meeting with Design Team: 2/30/2023
  3. Test Pilot Locations: 3/05/2023
  4. Product Launch: 3/15/2023

High level requirements

Requirement User Story Importance
Must be mobile responsive on both android and iOS devices As a retail team member I want to scan products directly into the app so that I do not have to use spreadsheets or outdated devices. High
Must only allow authorized staff to access the app As an end-user, I want to have the correct user permissions so that I can successfully update stock levels High

Project risks

Risk Probability Impact Mitigation
Project delay due to slowness and bugs Medium Medium Ensure we have up-to-date software
Exceeding our budget Medium High Ensure we have a clear budget
`
